title: Spaces Catalog Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating physical spaces catalog YAML files in the Public Transportation Information System architecture

spaces.description: List of space categories available in the public transportation domain

id.description: Unique identifier for the space element following the pattern space:<name>

name.description: The name of the space category

description.description: A brief description of the space

type.description: Classification indicating whether the space is physical or virtual

is_transit_infrastructure.description: Whether the space is part of the transit system's own infrastructure (e.g., stops, stations, terminals)

route_type.description: GTFS route types that typically operate at or serve this space (0=Tram, 1=Subway, 2=Rail, 3=Bus, 4=Ferry, 5=Cable tram, 6=Aerial lift, 7=Funicular, 11=Trolleybus, 12=Monorail)
